parameters: First of all, nice to meet you
Because I came all the way here
Let me give you some information. \!
What do you want to hear?
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
This institute is the Suzuguri Institute. \!
To put it simply, it's immortal research. \!
To create a miracle that can bring people back to life
I am doing all kinds of research.
I usually just have such a tickling trap
This is almost a hobby of a professor.
By the way, this institute is also a mobile fortress
You can also move around the world. \!
I am currently staying in Mr. Purmir's hometown.
The laboratory seen from the outside is not big
Inside is a technique called compression space
It is several dozen times larger than it looks.
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Brought to a place like this
But maybe it was inevitable to come here
Maybe the day will come when I understand it?
Purmir is a fairy for the time being. \!
I shouldn't say more than that.
By the way, the ring on my neck
After that came to this institute
Let me wear it so that I can not get it
Without that, it could be life-threatening
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Don't say much about that person's information
I will reveal various things from myself
Because that person wants to stand out.
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
It is easy to say and is called "excitement".
I am in charge of the brain of this institute. \!
All the lab machines here are
I ’m a professor to play that role
That person often goes out to study
In short, I feel like an answering machine. \!
I sometimes want to go out ...
